attribs.name: ability_checks_query_var
attribs.current: ?{Ability Check|Strength +5,{{title=Strength Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 5[str]]]}}|Dexterity +1,{{title=Dexterity Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 1[dex]]]}}|Constitution +2,{{title=Constitution Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 2[con]]]}}|Intelligence -4,{{title=Intelligence Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -4[int]]]}}|Wisdom +1,{{title=Wisdom Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 1[wis]]]}}|Charisma -2,{{title=Charisma Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -2[cha]]]}}}

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJYmhXpKHbGVmM6-5fZ_display_text
attribs.current: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature right before its rider hits it with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make one another attack with its hooves against the target.

attribs.name: saving_throw_query_var
attribs.current: ?{Saving Throw|Strength +5,{{title=Strength Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 5[str]]]}}|Dexterity +1,{{title=Dexterity Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 1[dex]]]}}|Constitution +2,{{title=Constitution Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 2[con]]]}}|Intelligence -4,{{title=Intelligence Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -4[int]]]}}|Wisdom +1,{{title=Wisdom Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 1[wis]]]}}|Charisma -2,{{title=Charisma Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -2[cha]]]}}|Death +0, {{title=Death Saving throw}} {{death_saving_throw_chances=@{death_saving_throw_chances}}} {{death_saving_throw_successes=@{death_saving_throw_successes}}} {{death_saving_throw_failures=@{death_saving_throw_failures}}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + ]]}}}
